Description: Rest on the Flight to Egypt. The Virgin Mary seated with the Infant Christ in her lap to the right, St Joseph to the left, a donkey and a tree in the background; in an octagon shape Etching
Curator's comments: Although this print does not bear the artist's name, it was probably made by Jan Miel for stylistic reasons. For the pendant of this impression and comment, see S.4086.
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (3)
Weigel 1843 / Suppléments au Peintre-Graveur de Adam Bartsch (44.12)
